content: in a legal case the defendant has been ordered to pay 10880 euros in compensation to the claimants the payment will be made to the ministry of finances bank account within five working days after signing a compromise agreement the defendant is also required to provide the claimants with information about the payment both parties have agreed to divide an inheritance which was confirmed by a notary the compromise agreement states that 6500 euros will go to one party and 4380 euros will go to the other party a copy of the agreement will be forwarded to the court if either party fulfills their obligations the other party has the right to withdraw from the compromise an appeal regulation was submitted to the tallinn district court and the haapsalu courthouse the claimants filed a lawsuit in the pärnu county court demanding the termination of the community inheritance and the division of the estate they also require compensation from the defendants and consent to delete the owner entry in the real estate register the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the defendants the compromise agreement was presented to a notary the court reviewed the materials and confirmed the validity of the compromise agreement terminating the case the compromise agreement must meet certain requirements and be submitted to the court the court will only approve the compromise if it does not violate any laws or important public interests the court also approves the compromise agreement and ends the case the proceedings are terminated due to the abandonment of the claim through the compromise the civil case is closed due to the compromise agreement
